title: Test
subtitle: Subtitle
citation: Quarcoopome, Nii Otokunor. (p. 135) "Art of the Akan." Art Institute of Chicago Museum Studies 23, no. 2 (1997): 135-97.
quote: Generally, the term "Akan" is applied to the group of related peoples residing in the southern, mostly forested, regions of what are today the republics of Ghana and Cote d'Ivoire (Ivory Coast) in West Africa. These include groups such as the Akwapim, Akyem, Anyi, Aowin, Asante, Bono, Denkyira, Fante, Kwahu, Nzima, and Sefwi
